alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 03 at 11:03PM MST until January 05 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON MST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West wind 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...South Lincoln County, and Sweetwater County. * WHEN...High wind warning from 3 AM to noon Tuesday. High wind watch is in effect from late Tuesday night through Wednesday evening. There will be a lull in the high wind event Tuesday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Enhanced blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive. In a parking lot, park into the wind to minimize the possibility of your car door hitting another parked vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County
